summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Portage Bay Place from Allison Street to Eastlake Avenue; by constructing watermain together with the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15593 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
